channel.title: CVE Feed for Reolink -- RLC-410W
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Reolink -- RLC-410W

item.title: CVE-2021-44356|2024-08-04T04:17:24.902Z -- reolink -- rlc-410w
item.description: Multiple denial of service vulnerabilities exist in the cgiserver.cgi JSON command parser functionality of Reolink RLC-410W v3.0.0.136_20121102. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to a reboot. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-40405|2024-08-04T02:44:10.138Z -- reolink -- rlc-410w
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the cgiserver.cgi Upgrade API functionality of Reolink RLC-410W v3.0.0.136_20121102. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to a reboot. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.
